content: sizes this hat has two sizes adult medium 6 5 in or 16 5 cm laid flat fits 20-22 in or 51-56 cm and large 8 in or 20 cm laid flat fits 22-24 or 56-61 cm it is difficult to adjust the length of this pattern other than the length of the ribbing you could omit rounds 24-27 to make it a bit shorter my finished hat is about 11 inches 28 cm deep unfolded materials yarn approximately 180/240 yds 165/220 m of worsted weight yarn for sizes medium/large i used malabrigo rios this is a lighter worsted weight yarn 210 yd/200 m per 100 g if your yarn is heavier you might run out of yarn and/or have a larger hat if you are worried about running short of yarn you can opt for a single brim needles size us 6 4 mm needles or whatever size is needed to make gauge 16-inch 40 cm circulars and double-pointed needles or your preferred method of medium- and small- circumference knitting in the round size us 4 3 5 mm needles or 1-2 sizes smaller than your main needles 16-inch circulars for knitting the brim ribbing gauge 20 stitches and 27 row in 4 in x 4 in 10 cm x 10 cm of stockinette using the larger needles
